title: Santa

properties.value: Santa Claus is a Christmas themed non-player character who made an appearance in various Christmas events.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Santa Claus
 Santa was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.

Santa Claus is a Christmas themed non-player character who made an appearance in various Christmas events.

Contents

  • 1 2014
  • 2 2015
  • 3 2017
  • 4 2019
  • 5 Dialogue
  • 6 Concept art

2014[edit | edit source]

As a bearded stranger, he requests eight full puppet boxes from Diango, and the player delivers it to the stranger. When returning to Diango, the player is rewarded Hats and scarves. His appearance suggests that he is Santa Claus.

2015[edit | edit source]

During the 2015 event, he is located in the White Knights' Castle, accompanied by two of his bodyguards. Because Anti-Santa is on the loose, he claims that it is too dangerous for him to be out there, so the White Knights' are keeping him there until it is safe.

2017[edit | edit source]

During the 2017 event, he is on holiday, located in the Corsair Cove with his son, Jack Frost.

2019[edit | edit source]

During the 2019 event, he is standing in Varrock square, surrounded by grumpy children demanding gingerbread gnomes.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.
Click here for a list of other transcripts that this NPC speaks in.

[[File:Santa chathead.png|left]]
'''Santa Claus''' is a Christmas themed [[non-player character]] who made an appearance in various [[Christmas event]]s.

==2014==
As a bearded stranger, he requests eight full [[puppet box]]es from [[Diango]], and the player delivers it to the stranger. When returning to Diango, the player is rewarded [[Hats and scarves]]. His appearance suggests that he is Santa Claus.

==2015==
During the 2015 event, he is located in the [[White Knights' Castle]], accompanied by two of [[Santa's bodyguard|his bodyguards]]. Because [[Anti-Santa]] is on the loose, he claims that it is too dangerous for him to be out there, so the White Knights' are keeping him there until it is safe.

==2017==
During the 2017 event, he is on holiday, located in the [[Corsair Cove]] with his son, [[Jack Frost]].

==2019==
During the 2019 event, he is standing in [[Varrock]] square, surrounded by grumpy children demanding gingerbread gnomes.
